name: Starlight Summons

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Spell Focus (conjuration), able to cast summon nature's ally.

sections.body: Creatures you summon gain the Blind-Fight feat, a +5 bonus to Perception and Stealth checks in dim light or darkness, and their natural weapons are treated as cold iron for overcoming damage reduction.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your summoned minions slink along under the shadows of the stars.
